summary: Comprehensive testing of Elevate AI placement readiness platform V2. Tested all major features including dashboard, coding arena, aptitude gym, communication studio, and recommendation engine. Backend APIs working 100%, frontend fully functional with excellent 3-panel coding layout and all required features.
passed_tests: Backend API health (100% success rate - 13/13 tests passed)
Dashboard loads with floating company names background
AI Recommendation cards display correctly (2 cards generated)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Coding, Aptitude, Communication, Profile)
Coding page 3-panel layout: DSA sidebar (20 topics) | Question panel | Compiler+Terminal
Coding page shows full problem details (title, statement, input/output format, constraints, sample I/O, explanation)
Playground Mode button exists and toggles correctly
Code execution returns proper terminal-style output format (Running Code... Input... Output... Status...)
AI Code Evaluation returns structured scores (Logic, Optimization, Quality /10)
Language selection working (Python, Java, C++, JavaScript)
DSA topic navigation and question selection working
Monaco editor integration and code input working
Reset code functionality working
Aptitude page shows 10 topic cards as required
YouTube video integration working in aptitude topics
Quiz topic buttons present (4 quiz topics per aptitude area)
Communication page shows both required buttons: 'Start Practice' and 'AI Mock Interview'
Speech practice page with record button and filler detection
AI Mock Interview page with camera toggle and text input alternative
Profile page loads with stats cards and history tabs
Progress API working and XP tracking functional
Recommendation engine generating personalized cards based on user progress
Buttons remain visible on hover (max scale behavior correct)
Floating company names animation in background working
All navigation and routing working properly
action_item_for_main_agent: One minor issue noted: Quiz generation occasionally takes longer than expected due to AI processing time, but this is expected behavior for real-time AI quiz generation. No critical fixes needed. All core functionality working as specified.
